structure.unit: A HOSPITALIZATION OF THE MENTALLY ILL

law.catch_line: Rates for payment for provision of hospital services.
law.text: Each public or private hospital, other than a state-operated or contracted mental hospital or institution, which provides services under KRS 202A.008, 202A.011, 202A.028, 202A.041, 202A.051, 202A.071, 202A.081, 202A.101, 202A.141, 202A.241, 202A.251, 202A.261, 202A.271, 202B.170, 202B.200, 387.540, 504.085, 600.020, 645.020, 645.120, and 645.280 shall be paid for the services at the same rates the hospital negotiates with the Department for Behavioral Health, Developmental and Intellectual Disabilities or the regional community program for mental health and for individuals with an intellectual disability.
law.history: Amended 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 146, sec. 35, effective July 12, 2012; and ch. 158, sec. 24, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 498, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1994.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/12/2012). This statute was amended by 2012 Ky. Acts chs. 146 and 158, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
